csdl.jupiter.ui.view.editor
Class ReviewEditorView

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.core.commands.common.EventManager

              csdl.jupiter.ui.view.editor.ReviewEditorView
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension, org.eclipse.ui.IPersistable, org.eclipse.ui.IViewPart, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart2, org.eclipse.ui.part.IWorkbenchPartOrientation
public class ReviewEditorView
extends org.eclipse.ui.part.ViewPart

Provides Jupiter editor view to edit an issue.

Takuya Yamashita

setFocus

public void setFocus()
Sets focus on a specific field depending upon a phase. If the phase is individual mode, the type combo will be focused. If it is team mode, the assigned to combo will be focused. If it is rework mode, the status combo will be focused.

Specified by:
setFocus in interface org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart
Specified by:
setFocus in class org.eclipse.ui.part.WorkbenchPart
See Also:
WorkbenchPart.setFocus()

bringViewToTop

public static ReviewEditorView bringViewToTop()
                                       throws ReviewException
Brings the code review view to the top no matter when review view is closed or not. Means that it is opened if it has not been opened yet, or it is brought to top if it already has been opened, but not brought to top.

Returns:
the ReviewTableView instance to be opened and/or bright to top.
Throws:
ReviewException - if part could not be initialized.

getActiveView

public static ReviewEditorView getActiveView()
Provides the active view of the Review editor view. This active review editor view associates with the active window. Returns null if there is no active review editor view in the active window.

Returns:
the active review editor view. Returns null if there is no active review editor view in the active window.

getViews

public static ReviewEditorView[] getViews()
Provides the array of the Review editor view. A review editor view in the array associates with the opened window. The array might contain null if there is no active review editor view in the active window.

Returns:
the array of the review editor views.

hideView

public static void hideView()
Hides this view part.

isEnable - set true if all the fields are enable.

setNewEmptyReviewIssue

public void setNewEmptyReviewIssue(org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile iReviewFile)
                            throws ReviewException
Sets new empty ReviewIssue instance and set it to the editor view.

Parameters:
iReviewFile - the IFile review file instance.
Throws:
ReviewException - if ReviewIssue instance was not created.
